CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: This is the first report on spirobifluorene - based conjugated polymers used for polymer solar cells , demonstrating the great potential of spirobifluorene moiety as an electron - donating unit for the construction of main chain donor - acceptor alternating conjugated polymers for high performance polymer solar cells .

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Spirobifluorene |
| Spirobifluorene moiety |
| Conjugated polymers |
| Main chain donor-acceptor alternating conjugated polymers |

Note: "Spirobifluorene" and "Spirobifluorene moiety" are both considered as "Material Name" entities, as they refer to the same chemical compound.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid "Material Name" entities:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Spirobifluorene |
| Conjugated polymers |

The following entities were removed:

* "Spirobifluorene moiety" (not a material name, but a description of the molecular structure)
* "Main chain donor-acceptor alternating conjugated polymers" (too specific and not a material name)
